pages.text: Sieving Crushed Netherrack and using the Netherite Mesh will output:$(br)-Gold Piece: 0.15, 0.075$(br)-Quartz Dust: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Blaze Powder: 0.075, 0.0375$(br)-Cobalt Piece: 0.03, 0.015$(br)-Crimson Iron Dust: 0.03, 0.015$(br)-Draconium Dust: 0.01$(br)-Benitoite Crystal:$(br) 0.005, 0.0025$(br)-Emeraldite Shards:$(br) 0.005, 0.0025$(br)-Netherite Scrap: 0.005, 0.0025
